---
title: "Case Study"
---

-   Presents the driving question/purpose of analysis early on in the data story

-   Begins with a brief overview describing the approach taken and main findings before diving into the full details

-   Describes the data

    -   Clean, small code chunks interspersed with text to help guide the reader

    -   Simple clean visualizations effectively display trends in the data

-   Rather than being lumped into a single section, the results and analysis are broken up into specific sections of the investigation

-   Wraps up analysis in conclusion and explores meaning of findings

-   Not very technical, avoids jargon, understandable by wide audience

-   Visualizations are simple and have clear messages, but the report could have benefited from at least one more complex, eye-catching visualization

-   Overall nice flow between text, visualizations, and code chunks

    -   Good model for our report
